Title: Madras chili  (Cauliflower/Mushroom/Baby Corn/Paneer(+$1))

Title: Idly (with Sambar/Rasam)

Description: Crispy lentil donut served with chutneys, sambar or rasam.

Title: Kuzhi paniyaram
Description: Fermented rice and lentil batter steamed in a kuzhi(cup) paniyaram pan served with sambar and chutneys.

Description: Mixed Vegetables  with gram flour and deep-fried
